achievements: Known for his provocative and often controversial art
One of the Young British Artists (YBAs)
Famous for works like 'The Physical Impossibility of Death in the Mind of Someone Living'
Holds the record for the most expensive work by a living artist sold at auction
Won a Primetime Emmy Award and a Golden Globe Award for his role as Nicholas Brody in the Showtime series Homeland
Known for roles in films like 'Band of Brothers', 'Ocean's Twelve', and 'Robin Hood'
